DOC.brief_summary: 1 . To assess safety allogeneic injection expand ADSCs patient Moderate Severe Chronic Kidney Disease 2 . To assess efficacy allogeneic injection expand ADSCs patient Moderate Severe Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.brief_title: Adipose-derived Stem Cells ( ADSCs ) Moderate Severe Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: A patient eligible study following apply : 1 . Aged 2080 year ( inclusive ) 2 . With chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) stage 3B 4 ( eGFR 15 44 mL/min/1.73m2 ( inclusive ) ) Note : eGFR = estimate glomerular filtration rate 3 . Having provide informed consent Any patient meeting exclusion criterion exclude study participation . 1 . Ascertained hypersensitivity component use study Note : include gentamicin , DMSO , Agglutex ( heperin ) 2 . With inadequate hematologic function : absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) < 1,500/μL OR platelet < 100,000/μL OR Hemoglobin < 8 g/dL 3 . With inadequate hepatic function : serum bilirubin , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) alkaline phosphatase ( AKP ) > 2.5 x institutional upper limit normal ( ULN ) 4 . With hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) > 8.0 % 5 . With serious prior ongoing medical condition ( e.g . concomitant illness cardiovascular ( e.g . New York Heart Association grade III IV ) , hepatic ( e.g . ChildPugh Class C ) , psychiatric condition , alcoholism , drug abuse ) , medical history , physical finding , ECG finding , laboratory abnormality investigator ' opinion could interfere result trial adversely affect safety patient 6 . Pregnant lactate woman premenopausal childbearing potential take reliable contraceptive method ( ) study period 7 . With body mass index ( BMI ) great equal 36 kg/m2 8 . With known history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection type hepatitis 9 . Judged applicable study investigator difficulty followup observation 10 . With serious diseases/medical history consider investigator condition enter trial 11 . Having participate investigational study within 4 week enter study 12 . Known suspected abuse alcohol narcotic 13 . With known history cancer within past 5 year 14 . With autoimmune disease 15 . With cystic kidney disease require kidney dialysis 16 . With precancerous condition cancer within past 5 year Screening visit
